paper.title: Research on the intelligent investment systems based on fuzzy clustering ensemble analysis
paper.abstract: This paper develops a fuzzy clustering method based on the fuzzy t-norm, and uses the data of China securities market to analyze the factors influencing the portfolio selection. Furthermore, this paper estimates an investment portfolio based on fuzzy clustering. The results show that the investor can learn the feature of securities. This method is very important for the portfolio selection.

domain_result.justification: 该论文开发了一种基于模糊t-范数的模糊聚类方法，并利用中国证券市场数据分析了影响投资组合选择的因素，进一步基于模糊聚类估计了投资组合。这些内容明确表明其核心技术应用于投资组合管理领域。
